imgDesc.text: When creatures are affected by <color=#ffe14b>Hydro</color> and <color=#ffe14b>Dendro</color> , the Bloom reaction will be triggered, creating <color=#ffe14b>Dendro Cores</color> .

Only a certain number of Dendro Cores can exist at the same time. If new ones are created once this limit is reached, or if the duration of the existing Dendro Cores ends, the pre-existing Dendro Cores will burst, dealing AoE Dendro DMG...

When Dendro Cores come into contact with <color=#ffe14b>Pyro</color> , they will trigger Burgeon, causing even greater AoE Dendro DMG. When Dendro Cores come into contact with <color=#ffe14b>Electro</color> , they will trigger Hyperbloom and transform into homing Sprawling Shots.
